description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Fun in the Gulf is an implementation of the abstract strategy board game Lines of Action.  We hope you enjoy our unique, internet-phenomenon-influenced theme as you play this classic board game for what is probably the first time (if you are a college-aged male who spends 10-20 hours per week online, we know you will).
